content: The most beneficial thing to you here is the fire from above. He is also impacted by the fire attacks, so watch where the projectiles land and bait him into standing in the vicinity of them. This will build up his Fire Damage, weakening his health bar while you attack, and also completely stagger him at times, leaving him vulnerable to longer combos and heavier attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass I' and the sub-subsection 'Boss Fight - Pale-Axe Stalwart'.
The content is as follows:
The most beneficial thing to you here is the fire from above. He is also impacted by the fire attacks, so watch where the projectiles land and bait him into standing in the vicinity of them. This will build up his Fire Damage, weakening his health bar while you attack, and also completely stagger him at times, leaving him vulnerable to longer combos and heavier attacks.
